h2_title: Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide
content: If you see the hand curl into a fist before raising up, be ready for it to slam down on the ground nearby and claw into the ground, before scraping along the a length of the arena in a quick dash.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand', specifically from the subsection 'Buddha's Right Hand Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If you see the hand curl into a fist before raising up, be ready for it to slam down on the ground nearby and claw into the ground, before scraping along the a length of the arena in a quick dash.
